paddingSchemes
Class PowerOfTwo

java.lang.Object
  paddingSchemes.PowerOfTwo
Direct Known Subclasses:
DividedPower
public class PowerOfTwo
extends java.lang.Object

Calculates biggest power of two, that is smaller than given prime. NOTE! Class assumes that it gets a prime as a parameter.

Author:
Jukka Tuominen
